excerpt.description: A short extract from a text

img.description: Image; the (external) representation of the document containing the text

par.description: A distinct section in a text, indicated by a new line or an indentation

s.description: contains a sentence-like division of a text

sic.description: contains text reproduced although apparently incorrect or inaccurate

corr.description: contains the correct form of a passage apparently erroneous in the copy text

said.description: (speech or thought) indicates passages thought or spoken aloud

persName.description: personal name: contains a proper noun or proper noun phrase referring to a person

emph.description: (emphasized) marks words or phrases which are stressed or emphasized for linguistic or rhetorical effect

type.description: used to classify the source of the text in the document

title.description: used to indicate the title of the text in the document

source.description: refers to the source of the (external) representation of the document containing the text

author.description: refers to the name of the author(s) of the text in the document

year.description: refers to the year of publication of the text in the document

page.description: indicates the page(s) of the text in the document

id.description: points to a unique identifier for the element bearing the attribute

who.description: points to the unique identifier of a person in the document

n.description: TAGML attribute; gives a number for an element which is not necessarily unique in the document
